summary: The Right to Eat Authentic and Legitimate Meat Act of 2025 (REAL Meat Act of 2025) aims to prohibit the use of federal funds for cell-cultured meat production and related activities, with an exception for NASA for off-planet consumption. The bill defines cell-cultured meat as meat sourced from animal cells and artificially produced in a laboratory. It seeks to prevent federal funding for research, support of related organizations, inclusion in USDA programs, and promotion and advertisement of cell-cultured meat.
